translations.text: By the stars when they fade away!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wannajmi itha hawa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Your fellow man<sup foot_note=77441>1</sup> is neither misguided nor astray.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ma dalla sahibukum wamaghawa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Nor does he speak of his own whims.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wama yantiqu AAani alhawa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: It is only a revelation sent down ˹to him˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: In huwa illa wahyun yooha
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: He has been taught by one ˹angel˺ of mighty power<sup foot_note=77442>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: AAallamahu shadeedu alquwa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: and great perfection, who once rose to ˹his˺ true form<sup foot_note=77443>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Thoo mirratin fastawa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: while on the highest point above the horizon,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wahuwa bil-ofuqi al-aAAla
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: then he approached ˹the Prophet˺, coming so close
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Thumma dana fatadalla
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: that he was only two arms-lengths away or even less.<sup foot_note=77444>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fakana qaba qawsayni aw adna
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Then Allah revealed to His servant what He revealed ˹through Gabriel˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Faawha ila AAabdihi maawha
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: The ˹Prophet’s˺ heart did not doubt what he saw.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ma kathaba alfu-adu maraa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translation.text: Then will you dispute with him

translations.text: How can you ˹O pagans˺ then dispute with him regarding what he saw?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Afatumaroonahu AAala mayara
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: And he certainly saw that ˹angel descend˺ a second time
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walaqad raahu nazlatan okhra
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: at the Lote Tree of the most extreme limit ˹in the seventh heaven˺—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: AAinda sidrati almuntaha
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: near which is the Garden of ˹Eternal˺ Residence—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: AAindaha jannatu alma/wa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: while the Lote Tree was overwhelmed with ˹heavenly˺ splendours!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ith yaghsha assidratama yaghsha
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: The ˹Prophet’s˺ sight never wandered, nor did it overreach.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ma zagha albasaru wamatagha
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لَقَدْ رَأَىٰ مِنْ ءَايَـٰتِ رَبِّهِ ٱلْكُبْرَىٰٓ

translations.text: He certainly saw some of his Lord’s greatest signs.<sup foot_note=77445>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Laqad raa min ayatirabbihi alkubra
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Now, have you considered ˹the idols of˺ Lât and ’Uzza,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Afaraaytumu allata walAAuzza
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: and the third one, Manât, as well?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wamanata aththalithataal-okhra
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Do you ˹prefer to˺ have sons while ˹you attribute˺ to Him daughters?<sup foot_note=77446>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Alakumu aththakaru walahual-ontha
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Then this is ˹truly˺ a biased distribution!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Tilka ithan qismatun deeza
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنْ هِىَ إِلَّآ أَسْمَآءٌ سَمَّيْتُمُوهَآ أَنتُمْ وَءَابَآؤُكُم مَّآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ بِهَا مِن سُلْطَـٰنٍ ۚ إِن يَتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا ٱلظَّنَّ وَمَا تَهْوَى ٱلْأَنفُسُ ۖ وَلَقَدْ جَآءَهُم مِّن رَّبِّهِمُ ٱلْهُدَىٰٓ

translations.text: These ˹idols˺ are mere names that you and your forefathers have made up<sup foot_note=77447>1</sup>—a practice Allah has never authorized. They follow nothing but ˹inherited˺ assumptions and whatever ˹their˺ souls desire, although ˹true˺ guidance has already come to them from their Lord.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: In hiya illa asmaonsammaytumooha antum waabaokum maanzala Allahu biha min sultanin inyattabiAAoona illa aththanna wamatahwa al-anfusu walaqad jaahum min rabbihimu alhuda
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Or should every person ˹simply˺ have whatever ˹intercessors˺ they desire?<sup foot_note=77448>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Am lil-insani ma tamanna
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: In fact, to Allah ˹alone˺ belongs this world and the next.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Falillahi al-akhiratu wal-oola
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ۞ وَكَم مِّن مَّلَكٍ فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ لَا تُغْنِى شَفَـٰعَتُهُمْ شَيْـًٔا إِلَّا مِنۢ بَعْدِ أَن يَأْذَنَ ٱللَّهُ لِمَن يَشَآءُ وَيَرْضَىٰٓ

translations.text: ˹Imagine˺ how many ˹noble˺ angels are in the heavens! ˹Even˺ their intercession would be of no benefit whatsoever, until Allah gives permission to whoever He wills and ˹only for the people He˺ approves.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wakam min malakin fee assamawatila tughnee shafaAAatuhum shay-an illa minbaAAdi an ya/thana Allahu liman yashao wayarda
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ لَيُسَمُّونَ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةَ تَسْمِيَةَ ٱلْأُنثَىٰ

translations.text: Indeed, those who do not believe in the Hereafter label angels as female,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna allatheena la yu/minoonabil-akhirati layusammoona almala-ikatatasmiyata al-ontha
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَا لَهُم بِهِۦ مِنْ عِلْمٍ ۖ إِن يَتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا ٱلظَّنَّ ۖ وَإِنَّ ٱلظَّنَّ لَا يُغْنِى مِنَ ٱلْحَقِّ شَيْـًٔا

translations.text: although they have no knowledge ˹in support˺ of this. They follow nothing but ˹inherited˺ assumptions. And surely assumptions can in no way replace the truth.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wama lahum bihi min AAilmin inyattabiAAoona illa aththanna wa-innaaththanna la yughnee mina alhaqqishay-a
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَأَعْرِضْ عَن مَّن تَوَلَّىٰ عَن ذِكْرِنَا وَلَمْ يُرِدْ إِلَّا ٱلْحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنْيَا

translations.text: So turn away ˹O Prophet˺ from whoever has shunned Our Reminder,<sup foot_note=77449>1</sup> only seeking the ˹fleeting˺ life of this world.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: FaaAArid AAan man tawalla AAanthikrina walam yurid illa alhayataaddunya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ذَٰلِكَ مَبْلَغُهُم مِّنَ ٱلْعِلْمِ ۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِمَن ضَلَّ عَن سَبِيلِهِۦ وَهُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِمَنِ ٱهْتَدَىٰ

translations.text: This is the extent of their knowledge. Surely your Lord knows best who has strayed from His Way and who is ˹rightly˺ guided.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Thalika mablaghuhum mina alAAilmiinna rabbaka huwa aAAlamu biman dalla AAan sabeelihiwahuwa aAAlamu bimani ihtada
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلِلَّهِ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ لِيَجْزِىَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَسَـٰٓـُٔوا۟ بِمَا عَمِلُوا۟ وَيَجْزِىَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَحْسَنُوا۟ بِٱلْحُسْنَى

translations.text: To Allah ˹alone˺ belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth so that He may reward the evildoers according to what they did, and reward the good-doers with the finest reward<sup foot_note=77450>1</sup>—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walillahi ma fee assamawatiwama fee al-ardi liyajziya allatheena asaoobima AAamiloo wayajziya allatheena ahsanoobilhusna
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ٱلَّذِينَ يَجْتَنِبُونَ كَبَـٰٓئِرَ ٱلْإِثْمِ وَٱلْفَوَٰحِشَ إِلَّا ٱللَّمَمَ ۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ وَٰسِعُ ٱلْمَغْفِرَةِ ۚ هُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِكُمْ إِذْ أَنشَأَكُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَرْضِ وَإِذْ أَنتُمْ أَجِنَّةٌ فِى بُطُونِ أُمَّهَـٰتِكُمْ ۖ فَلَا تُزَكُّوٓا۟ أَنفُسَكُمْ ۖ هُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِمَنِ ٱتَّقَىٰٓ

translations.text: those who avoid major sins and shameful deeds, despite ˹stumbling on˺ minor sins. Surely your Lord is infinite in forgiveness. He knew well what would become of you as He created you from the earth<sup foot_note=77451>1</sup> and while you were ˹still˺ fetuses in the wombs of your mothers.<sup foot_note=77452>2</sup> So do not ˹falsely˺ elevate yourselves. He knows best who is ˹truly˺ righteous.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Allatheena yajtaniboona kaba-iraal-ithmi walfawahisha illa allamama innarabbaka wasiAAu almaghfirati huwa aAAlamu bikum ithanshaakum mina al-ardi wa-ith antum ajinnatun feebutooni ommahatikum fala tuzakkoo anfusakumhuwa aAAlamu bimani ittaqa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Have you seen the one who turned away ˹from Islam,˺
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Afaraayta allathee tawalla
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: and ˹initially˺ paid a little ˹for his salvation˺, and then stopped?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: WaaAAta qaleelan waakda
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Does he have the knowledge of the unseen so that he sees ˹the Hereafter˺?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: aAAindahu AAilmu alghaybi fahuwa yara
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَمْ لَمْ يُنَبَّأْ بِمَا فِى صُحُفِ مُوسَىٰ

translations.text: Or has he not been informed of what is in the Scripture of Moses,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Am lam yunabba/ bima fee suhufimoosa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: and ˹that of˺ Abraham, who ˹perfectly˺ fulfilled ˹his covenant˺?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-ibraheema allathee waffa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: ˹They state˺ that no soul burdened with sin will bear the burden of another,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Alla taziru waziratun wizraokhra
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَن لَّيْسَ لِلْإِنسَـٰنِ إِلَّا مَا سَعَىٰ

translations.text: and that each person will only have what they endeavoured towards,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waan laysa lil-insani illa masaAAa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: and that ˹the outcome of˺ their endeavours will be seen ˹in their record˺,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waanna saAAyahu sawfa yura
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translation.text: he will be recompensed for it

translations.text: then they will be fully rewarded,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Thumma yujzahu aljazaa al-awfa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: and that to your Lord ˹alone˺ is the ultimate return ˹of all things˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waanna ila rabbika almuntaha
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Moreover, He is the One Who brings about joy and sadness.<sup foot_note=77453>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waannahu huwa adhaka waabka
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: And He is the One Who gives life and causes death.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waannahu huwa amata waahya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: And He created the pairs—males and females—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waannahu khalaqa azzawjayni aththakarawal-ontha
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: from a sperm-drop when it is emitted.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Min nutfatin itha tumna
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: And it is upon Him to bring about re-creation.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waanna AAalayhi annash-ata al-okhra
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: And He is the One Who enriches and impoverishes.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waannahu huwa aghna waaqna
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: And He alone is the Lord of Sirius.<sup foot_note=77454>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waannahu huwa rabbu ashshiAAra
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: And He destroyed the first ˹people of˺ ’Ȃd,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waannahu ahlaka AAadan al-oola
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: and ˹then˺ Thamûd,<sup foot_note=77455>1</sup> sparing no one.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wathamooda fama abqa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَقَوْمَ نُوحٍ مِّن قَبْلُ ۖ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ هُمْ أَظْلَمَ وَأَطْغَىٰ

translations.text: And before ˹that He destroyed˺ the people of Noah, who were truly far worse in wrongdoing and transgression.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waqawma noohin min qablu innahum kanoohum athlama waatgha
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: And ˹it was˺ He ˹Who˺ turned the cities ˹of Sodom and Gomorrah˺ upside down.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walmu/tafikata ahwa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: How overwhelming was what covered ˹them˺!<sup foot_note=77456>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Faghashshaha ma ghashsha
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Now, which of your Lord’s favours will you dispute?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fabi-ayyi ala-i rabbika tatamara
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: This ˹Prophet˺ is a warner like earlier ones.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Hatha natheerun mina annuthurial-oola
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: The approaching ˹Hour˺ has drawn near.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Azifati al-azifat
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لَيْسَ لَهَا مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ كَاشِفَةٌ

translations.text: None but Allah can disclose it.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Laysa laha min dooni Allahi kashifat
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Do you find this revelation astonishing,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Afamin hatha alhadeethitaAAjaboon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: laughing ˹at it˺ and not weeping ˹in awe˺,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Watadhakoona wala tabkoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: while persisting in heedlessness?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waantum samidoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Instead, prostrate to Allah and worship ˹Him alone˺!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fasjudoo lillahi waAAbudoo
translations.resource_name: Transliteration
